results.name: Square array A(row,col) = A253887(A254055(row,col)) = A126760(A254101(row,col)).
comment: Starting with an odd number x = A135765(row,col), the result after one combined Collatz step (3x+1)/2 is found in A254051(row+1,col), and after iterated [i.e., we divide all powers of 2 out] Collatz step: x_new <- A139391(x) = A000265(3x+1) the resulting odd number x_new is located A135764(1,A254055(row+1,col)).
What the resulting odd number will be, is given by A254101(row+1,col) =  A000265(A254051(row+1,col)).
That number's column index in array A135765 is then given by A(row+1,col).
